Articles.Content:
PLEASE @SQUAD can you add an (part upgradable) seat to the Mk1 landercan and also to the mk2 version in IVA as well?

I ask this while you consider the art passes in 1.5.

With making history the KV series Onion, Pea and Pomegranate are the same size with added crew capacities and @MacLukyhas shown that it is possible within the IVA space of the Mk1.  Whilst MacLuky fits three I think that two crew gives the best balance.

To balance  an upgraded Mk1 2seat against the standard 2seat Mk2 could be a reduction in monopropellant for the Mk1. The Mk2 could also have some rcs added like in the with the Mk1-3 Command Pod update. 

There seems to be plenty of room for a 3rd crew member in the Mk2 as well which would give a landing option in stock for three kerbals.

Thanks and Peace.
Or cram them full with bags. Look at the soyuz, gemini etc. spacecraft make optimal use of space in stead of flying as spacious bathrooms.
